title: Dinnerbone：Minecraft玩家Java8使用率过半
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2015-2-7 20:42 编辑 
Yesterday, 55% of all Minecraft launches were on Java 8. This is very good news.
在昨天，基于Java8的Minecraft启动占了55%，真是个好消息呀~

replies.author: jamesskl
replies.txt_content: 哪天支持forge 在考虑更新{:10_523:}

replies.author: Dies
replies.txt_content: 占楼加水回复

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content: java8明明能打开1.7.10最新的forge

replies.author: Huai_Lang_Man
replies.txt_content: 我都是用6的，因为可以加速服务器。
1.7.10的forge已经支持java8了

replies.author: Park_Li
replies.txt_content:
jamesskl 发表于 2015-2-1 22:46
哪天支持forge 在考虑更新
现在我就是用着java8+1.7.10+forge 10.13.2.1230，难道我穿越了？怎么一堆人说不支持forge……

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
本来Java8用的好好的
但是忽然学会了装Mod于是被光影拖回Java7了...

replies.author: 暗凌
replies.txt_content: 刚在推特看见 想转过论坛来发我的第一个有意义帖子 结果就看到火把很早就发了Orz
纠结原文到底是launchers还是launches。。。

replies.txt_content:
1.7.10的各种mod 、服务器端都支持java8

从1.64的客户端就开始用java8了，服务器端很长一段时间只能java7

replies.author: locationiskey
replies.txt_content:
forge我记得在某次更新中已经修正了对java8的支持……
MinecraftForge/FML@641250d8536bad3af5a036b70dae94097176b420 Fix java 8u20. Closes #501 and a bunch of other bugs too.
不知道是不是上面这个……
